title: The Basic Profile Domain Schema
description: Contains the main information about an entity

EntityId.title: Internal Id for entities
EntityId.description: Contains Axesor360 unique ID for the entity

VendorEntityId.title: Vendor Id for Entities
VendorEntityId.description: External Id (from vendors) for the entity

LastUpdate.title: Info about last update
LastUpdate.description: Date of last update of the date contained

Name.title: Entity name
Name.description: Full name or business name of the entity

Alias.title: Entity alias
Alias.description: Alternative name, alias or search name of the entity

EntityType.title: Entity type
EntityType.description: Contains the specific nature of an entity

Status.title: Current status of the entity
Status.description: Contains the specific situation of the entity (for example, active)

StartDate.title: Starting date of the entity
StartDate.description: The entity started its activity in this day

LegalType.title: Legal form of the entity
LegalType.description: Related to legal entities, shows the specific type

BusinessType.title: Entity type within a group of entities
BusinessType.description: In holding or business groups, show the role of the company within them

LastDepositEnrollmentYear.title: Last year filled for balance accounts or enrollments
LastDepositEnrollmentYear.description: Depending on the country, this field shows the last year filled by the company concerning their annual accounts or similar (E.g. enrollments)

CountryISO.title: Country of the entity (ISO)
CountryISO.description: Three digits ISO code for the entity's country

Size.title: Size of the entity
Size.description: Size of the entity, according to local criteria

ContactInfo.title: The Contact info schema
ContactInfo.description: Dataset with contact information of the entity

PhoneNumbers.title: Telephone number
PhoneNumbers.description: Phone contact numbers of the entity

Email.title: Email address
Email.description: Email address to contact with the entity

Site.title: Website of the entity
Site.description: URL of the main website of the entity

SharedCapital.title: Shared capital
SharedCapital.description: Dataset with contact information of the entity

Value.title: Shared Capital value
Value.description: Curren shared capital of the entity

CurrencyISO.title: Capital value currency
CurrencyISO.description: ISO code describing the currency used for the capital value
